title: Did President Trump Washington, Portwright, replace the Carpathi?
subtitle: Reports that the President was exchanging photos on the walls of the White House with photos of the characters of "Ghostbusters II" come from a relatively mysterious disinfectant of the irony and errors of the news.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Trump replaced the White House photo of George Washington with a Vigo Carpatian painting.
